newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-News says STAR TV losses in line.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-News says STAR TV losses in line.

text.p: Media group News Corp Ltd said on Thursday that 1995/96 losses at its STAR TV operations, its pan-Asian satellite broadcaster, were in line with expectations.
Earlier, the company reported a six percent lower full year operating profit of A$1.26 billion for the group as a whole.
